tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr Jyothi Lakshmi for my 1st and 2nd pregnancy. She is one of the good experienced and best doctor in Bangalore. We had a great experience with her. From  first consultation till the time of delivery she is very friendly and listen to all our query with patience and give best possible solutions. She always have a smile on her face and answer to all your queries in best possible calm way. 24/7 at any point of time she is available to answer your calls and give you good suggestions. From the beginning am very keen towards normal delivery. I had few complications like in beggining had low placenta kidney stones inspite of all this she guided me to be calm throughout my 9months and always made me to be strong and adviced me to look around positiveness regarding my normal delivery. 
On 19th of june 2022 NIght I had been admitted to hospital in cloud nine Malleshwaram, and 20th june morning I started to get contractions, and by 10AM I had got strong contractions so I was shifted to labour room. Dr. jyothi lakshmi was so supportive tat she was their with me for the entire process and it was very long labour tat due to chord surrounded to baby neck, but still she gave me a hope and confidence that will try.. And  as per her words and suggestions I had got normal delivery with healthy baby by night around 9PM. Also even post delivery she is very helpful interms of medications as well as post delivery advices. We are very much thankful to Dr. Jyothi Lakshmi for her entire support and suggestions. 
I would highly recommend her as your Gynaecologist and trust me you will get a best treatment as well as best friendly doctor for all your queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The services that I received from Dr. JyothiLakshmi (CloudNine) is excellent. She has very good experience and wonderful gynaecologist surgeon. 
She explained everything in a very clear manner in all the phases of my pregrnancy and delivary (Pre and Post). She was also kind and friendly.Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment.It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. 
she is very understanding and listens to our concerns. She takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues and baby growth! Also, the staff is very friendly and professional. We never had to wait more than a few minutes when we arrive on time for an appointment. We highly recommend her to be get delivered healthy childrens!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I‚Äôm extremely overwhelmed to share that my family has been consulting Dr. T M Jyothilakshmi from past 10 years. I had both my deliveries with this Doctor. You can completely trust her. She is very friendly and has been great help and support throughout my pregnancy. Thanks a lot Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,
review: Dr. JyothiLakshmi was godsent for us during our desperate times.We were trying to conceive for 5+ years and changed so many gynaecologists to get the desired positive result and our wait ended after we started consulting her.She had put me on a pregnancy plan of IVF and even after my delivery she has been there to consult me for my health and future pregnancy plans.A very amiable and friendly doctor who is always ready to answer to all your queries with a smile üòä.We delivered our baby this month and all thanks to her dedication to help me sustain my pregnancy which was a high risk IVF pregnancy during my 6th gestation.Thank you for everything doc !!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Firstly doctors should remember patient‚Äôs name, at least she should see the file and address them by there name. She never remembers my name though I visited weekly and twice a week.

Coming to her check ups she is calm and talks to you with smile.

*But I don‚Äôt personally suggest this doctor.*
 
I had an emergency c-section. Though I was very well prepared for Normal delivery. They said baby had pooped and hence had to go though c-section. God should answer if this is treated as emergency for the baby, but when they took me to c-section ward and made me wait for almost half an hour with labor pain‚Ä¶ I was 8 cms dilated. Doctor was in her regular consultation room if I was not wrong leaving me with some brothers and sisters in the room. She didn‚Äôt  even call out what baby was born. I was suffering with labor pain almost 12 hours and with anesthesia I was eagerly waiting to here if it was a boy/girl. I finally saw my hubby ‚ÄúHe answered my question‚Äù.

I had to go through normal pain and due to the foreign equipment‚Äôs used during c-section I had an infection for which I consulted her for 3 months to heal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** **** ********* *** *** **** **** ** ********* *** **** ********* we started reading reviews of each and every doctor. However, with the help of Practo we found the amazing doctor ie Dr T.M Jyothi Lakshmi ma'am.
From day 1 she has been so helpful and understanding. Our entire journey during and after pregnancy phases were smooth. During the journey/phases we realised an expecting anxious parents would not only need a doctor who has great knowledge and experience but also who can comfort and assure us that we don't have to worry unnecessarily.
We are short of words to express our gratitude to ma'am. As proud parents of a beautiful baby girl we can say it was the best decision that we took to consult Dr T.M Jyothi Lakshmi ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: *** ** *** **** ************ ** ********** Blessed to bring my daughter into this world in her hands, on 29-Dec-2021. Her friendliness & listening attitude is very much adorable which made us feel a homely/family environment whenever we meet her. She became a part our family now :). I always admire her attire, it feels soo good to see her with a lovely smile on her face always.  I had fibroids, PCOS, Low lying placenta she handled all my issues with atmost care. Most loveliest part was the way she explained fabulously how to take care & connect with baby in womb personally, mentally, emotionally & spiritually. Her support & responsiveness throughout pregnancy & Post-partum was fantabulous.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Consulted Dr.Jyothi Lakshmi mam for pregnancy and delivery.

This was my first pregnancy experience in Cloud Nine malleswaram hospital. Had consulted Dr.Jyothi Lakshmi mam. She was referred to us by one of our colleague. Since three years of marriage we had taken lots of medication for a child in various hospitals. But  nothing helped us out. Then after consulting Jyothi Lakshmi mam and under her guidance I conceived. Had great support and timely advise from her. She was a very friendly and cooperative doctor. We delivered a healthy baby under her guidance. Had a very great experience with her throughout my pregnancy. I would recommend her to others as well who are looking for help. Also cloud nine provided good service during my delivery. I would like to thank all the nursing staff who looked after me during my stay in the hospital. Was very much happy and greatfull to all of them who took good care of me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We consulted Dr. JyotiLakshmi T M for my first pregnancy. She was recommended by my office friend. Post consulting the doctor for the first time, we were glad that our baby is in safe hands.
We are happy with doctor‚Äôs friendliness, professionalism. She had cleared each n every queries which every new moms have and doesn‚Äôt get irritated.  We delivered our first baby on Feb 2nd and happy that the baby is healthy and till the end the doctor suggested for normal delivery and waited for natural pain to occur. 

The 9 months journey was pretty smooth with the support n proper guidance from the doctor.

We would recommend doctor JyothiLakshmi for any couples who are planning for the baby

We both thank the doctor wholeheartedly üòä
Thank you mam for all your support throughout my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a smooth experience through out my pregnancy and post pregnancy- I feel I have almost fully recovered within 2 weeks of delivery. Even though I had developed few infections during pregnancy, I was at ease due to doctor's calm response and timely advice. She never made me panic about anything, patiently responded to all my questions, always had a smile on her face, very friendly and I knew both my baby and I were in safe hands.  Overall very good experience! Thank you doctor for the wonderful experience:)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr Jyothi Lakshmi based on reference from my cousin in my 8th month of pregnancy. She is very calm and listen to all your queries and concerns, made very detailed notes on our concerns on our very first visit. She is a very caring and experienced doctor, her expertise helped in easy delivery of my baby. She will carefully look through every detail and let you know what is the best next step to be done. She will never enforce her decision, she will ask us to think and get back to her on the decision we need to take. I had a big fear on Operation theatre, she and her team who were in OT with me made sure my journey of OT is not fearful. I would highly recommend this clinic and doctor to all couples who are looking for a friendly and caring doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been consulting with Jyothi lakshmi madam from last 5 years from the time I conceived with my first baby. With great support from her my two pregnancy journeys went so soft. I never forget madam in my life.we are so lucky to have found her. I have no words for the doctor,*** ** *** ***** Thank you for delivering my 2 cute babies. She is very well experienced, spends enough time to explain the problem and provides timely support as well. She makes me relaxed everytime I meet her. She always welcomes with warm smile. And remembers name. I never thought of any other doctor for gynec issue. Though we have shifted our house in my second pregnancy I used to travel 20 km to meet madam. I recommended to few of my friends and family members. Highly recommend to all !! Thank you for all the support madam. You are the best. Love you so much.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr Jyothilaxmi in October 2019 during my first pregnancy and since from the first visit I was very satisfied with her treatment. My case was complicated with multiple fibroids but Ma'am handled my case with all the confidence and assured me that everything will be fine. She was always available on call in case of any emergency and made sure that I am fine and guided me accordingly. I delivered a healthy baby boy on 22 May 2020 via C-section. I highly recommend Dr Jyothi Lakshmi and thank her for all the support and guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It would be very less to write our experience in just 100 words about Dr.Jyothilakshmi. She is compassionate,very professional,****** **************Confident and solves her cases with great confidence and passion. She is a doctor whom we have seen with high ethics when it comes to profession. A friendly doctor you may say. Me and my wife are blessed with a kid now. All thanks to this amazing Doctor...! She is a real gem. Very strong and bold.Yeah, a doctor with a great experience we could say. She just solves even the critical or the critical situations very easily by her experiences..... Thank you doctor :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr Jyothilaxmi in Jan 2017 during my first pregnancy and since from the first visit I was very comfortable with Dr's nature and treatment which is most important aspect required when you are going through one of the important phase of life. I had normal delivery under her guidance. When I was pregnant for second time without any second thought we visited her and delivered healthy baby with normal delivery. 

We thank Dr Jyothilaxmi for her support and guidance she gave in both pregnancy. We truly recommend her for gynaecology related treatment.

Thanks & Regards, 
Nisha & Mani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We had visited the Doctor for my Gynaec Problems. We had prevously consulted many Doctors regarding my wifes Infertility and  she had lost hopes of Motherhood. Dr.Jyothilakshmi went through the History and assured us to try again to conceive ,She insisted on trying one last time .She assured us that it was her responsibility ,Weagreed half heartedly .She guided us  and within 6 months my Wife conceived .Though it was a High Risk Pregnancy alongwith Diabetes and Hypertension .She helped us with patience and timely Advice .and soon my wife delivered Twins .
We will be ever Grateful to her .Now both my Twin sons are doing Fine 
I will highly recommend her for her helpful attitude ,listening to patient queries and timely Advice .
Amit & Rajani

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We chose Dr. TM Jyothi Lakshmi purely based on the internet research on various popular Medicare Portals, right from the first day she was very friendly and quite cooperative,, she is a modern day doctor who understands the current generation patients and active in social media too, she actively responded to all my calls & sometimes scrutinize our reports shared via Whatsapp which saves a lot of my time without panic, my wife is quite comfortable to an extent that we have already Registered with Cloudnine and paid the initial advance even though we are in our early 2nd Trimester. Highly Recommend her for all maternity and gynecology Medicare. 

Regards, 
Usman

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello All,

Myself and my husband for the first time we visited Balaji Health care center for pregnancy planning.  we met DR Jyoti Lakshmi mam for the first time , just by checking the reviews in practo , we felt that she might be good and we visited her in her own clinic Balaji Health Care Center RT Nagar.  So during the first consulation itself she was very friendly with us and used to explain and answer to questions. During the first consultation mam asked us to undergo few tests , after test I got to know that i am having hormonal imbalances. So currently taking treatment for that with Jyoti lakshmi mam. She will prepare our body for pregnancy.  Unfortunately during my first consultation i was diagnosed with one of the rare case , and that rare case was found by Jyoti lakshmi mam. And she suggested us that we have to go for hymenotomy surgery(minor surgery max of 15 to 30 mins) , Jyoti lakshmi mam only operated it . And now I am normal. The case which was happened to me was  very rarest case . But  with doctor experience  she was able to tackle and operate it successfully.  Now  she is preparing my body to get pregnant.  So i will highly recommend Dr Jyoti Lakshmi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Consulted her for UTI. No antibiotics we're prescribed.She asked to to wait for clinical report with some medicine to subside condition. ** ********* ******** **** **** ******* *** ***** she suggested another tablet over phone asking me to visit if I don't feel better by Evening. Side effect symptoms did not occur so I did not visit her in the evening as my report was still pending from the lab. On Sunday I developed fever and chills with increased pain. I called the doctor again asking her if I could visit but she did not agree. She asked me to wait and come on Monday evening. Instead of listening to my problem she questioned me why I did not visit her on Saturday evening. I even requested her to suggest some tablet to manage on till Monday Evening but she denied asking me to consult another doctor knowing it was a Sunday and I could not find any one else. I had expected her to be more professional *** ********* ** ********** ****** *** *** *** ** ********** ** ****** **** ****** ******** She rudely hung up asking me to visit a doctor somewhere else on a Sunday where she herself could have been considerate to listen to my problem and suggest something.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very good Doctor. For someone whose pregnant for first time and with complications she made it look and feel very simple and normal. She has never made me feel conscious about my complications.

Concerned about patients and very friendly. Jovial and always available during her off duty hours when I was very uncomfortable.

Gave straight forward answers to all the questions I had every visit and cleared all my doubts. 

I'm very happy in my pregnancy . Thank you very much Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Jyothilakshmi mam is very friendly, explains patiently about the issues if any and listens to all queries.Also dedicates time to respond to  messages for the queries.

Doctor is very calm and will not let you get panic on anything and offers solution to problems.

I would highly recommend the doctor for pregnancy checkups and delivery.Had a very smooth experience.

Thank you very much mam!!
Regards
Rakshitha
reply_text: It was my pleasure to attend to you

tags: None
review: Doctor with a beautiful smile always and such a huge support she has been throughout my pregnancy and delivery. Her repeated advices, moral support, caring hand and understanding me so well has helped me so much. Happy to have met such a wonderful woman as my doctor. Thank you very much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We visited Dr Jyoti Lakshmi for my first pregnancy. Choosing this doctor was the best decision we had made. The doctor is very professional, polite, caring and has a smiling face. she will listen to all your issues patiently; she will also answer to all your questions slowly. She is very experienced as to which we delivered a healthy baby.  Will definitely recommend her for everyone who is looking out for a good doctor for gynec and pregnancy matters.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

We had visited Dr Jyothi Lakshmi Mam when my pregnancy got confirmed. She had given us best advices to follow and which helped us to have a healthy baby and have safe pregnancy. 
She is very friendly and good hearted human being. 
Thanks Mam for being there during my pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr JyothiLekshmi in cloudnine Malleshwaram and we were very satisfied with her approach. She completely supported my wife's decision to strive for normal delivery till end. Also, she was very swift on taking critical decisions based on facts and observations. We would recommend the doctor to anyone who is in search of a skilled and sincere obstrecian.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** *** **** **** ,I had a complicated pregnancy journey and with last hope I was referred to this doctor by my friend .Going to her was the best decision I made with regards to my pregnancy,she went through my case in detail and suggested the best course of action plan for us and delivered as per her words.She creates a stress free environment for the expecting mother and guides patiently ,is reachable always and supports post delivery as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I want to share our pleasant experience with Dr Jyothi Lakshmi. She took care of my wife with great care, provided correct tips, do's and don'ts every time that we met. Also she is so polite every time when we met and we felt it had genuine personal touch in it.  We had an unplanned delivery, but she came just for us at the night, made sure all went correctly till we were in the hospital. Due to that, now we have a blessed girl baby. Thank you doctor for your valuable support and personal care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting Dr.Jyothi Lakshmi from day 1 of my pregnancy. She was recommended by a friend to me. I had many queries and was very worried as it was my first pregnancy. However Dr was extremely patient and addressed all my queries and doubts very kindly. She is highly capable and always had a control on any situation like sugar/iron levels. She has helped me deliver my baby much more smoothly than I could imagine and I have no words to express my gratitude to Dr.Jyothilakshmi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

This was my first pregnancy and doctor made the 9 month journey really smooth and comfortable. Thank you so much for everything :-)

review: I visited Dr. Jyothi Lakshmi for my pregnancy. It was a smooth experience through out pregnancy and post pregnancy. In particular I like the smile on doctor's face, her friendly behaviour and patience in responding to all the questions to make me feel comfortable.
